'' Setting colors in grid on Part properties : state, classification
Dim i As Integer
For i=0 To Me.getItemCount()-1
Dim bg_color_state As String
Dim myCss As String
Dim thisItem As Item = Me.getItemByIndex(i) Dim thisStatus As String = thisItem.getProperty("classification","")
'------ Select (thisStatus)
Case "Standard Part" bg_color_state = "0%" 'black Case Else bg_color_state = "" 'none End Select
If bg_color_state <> "" Then myCss = ".major_rev {font-size:" & bg_color_state & "; }" 'myCss &= ".classification { p style="color:red"}" thisItem.setProperty("css",myCss)
End If Next i Return Me
